content.question: Use the passage to answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Describe ONE argument that the author makes about revolutions in the first paragraph. b) Explain how ONE piece of evidence from the period after 1750 would support the author’s argument about revolutions and class. c) Explain how ONE piece of evidence from the period after 1750 would challenge the author’s argument in the passage.

topic.text: 5.2: Nationalism and Revolutions in the Period from 1750 to 1900

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe a claim or argument in a text-based or non-text-based source.
